item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: I really like the Fog of war! Gives that element of secrecy to the gameplay so I can plan defenses without my opponent knowing about them. Can't wait to see the special minions that can resist slows etc.
item.content:encoded: I really like the Fog of war! Gives that element of secrecy to the gameplay so I can plan defenses without my opponent knowing about them. Can’t wait to see the special minions that can resist slows etc.
